Author: JerryEris
Description: Determine how the module is malfunctioning, then find the function being applied to variables you input and use a second function to find the solution using the numbers at the top. Tags: 14-buttons, keypad, query, comma, clear, submit, screens, digits, red-background
Name: Malfunctions

Souvenir.Explanation: Souvenir may ask about the result of the first query./r/nSouvenir may ask about the letters and number displayed on the top screen./r/nSouvenir may ask about the value of X.
